scripts.dev:client: gulp checkAPISchema && cd src/client && npm run start
scripts.test:unit:server: gulp checkAPISchema && cd src/server && npm run test:unit:server
scripts.test:unit:client: gulp checkAPISchema && cd src/client && cross-env CI=true npm run test && rimraf coverage
scripts.test:unit: npm run test:unit:server && npm run test:unit:client
scripts.build:client: gulp build:apiSchema && cd src/client && npm run build && ncp ./build ../../dist && rimraf ./build && rimraf ./node_modules
scripts.build:server: cross-env CGO_ENABLED=0 GOOS=linux GOARCH=amd64 go build -o ./dist ./src/server
scripts.build: rimraf ./dist && npm run build:client && npm run build:server
